title: Escort
description: ****This book contains subject matter that is suitable for adults 18 years of age and older.****I'm Callie Leveaux and I'm an escort for those with only the most specific of tastes. In my world, sex is a buffet. That dark, daring spot where only the most adventurous visit? That's my corner. The deviant ones with the least to lose come to me They get their fill, treating their palates while the rest steer clear, because they know what they like and they know only I can give it to them. My name is Callie and I'm the girl you've been waiting for. If you pay the right price, you can get a little taste.
author: Kate  Benson
